## Introduction

The purpose of this workflow is to analyze the results
generated by SOM_CC-RIX.Rmd.


```{r get_args}
analysis_dir <- "CC-RIX_adipose_Female_HFD_by_Treatment - Results"

is.interactive <- FALSE
#is.interactive <- TRUE
```

```{r source_code}
library("here")
data_dir <- here("Results", "SOM", analysis_dir)

all.fun <- list.files(here("Code"), pattern = ".R", full.names = TRUE)
for(j in 1:length(all.fun)){source(all.fun[j])}
```


```{r load_libraries,  warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, error = FALSE}
needed.packages <- c("pheatmap", "knitr")
load_libraries(needed.packages, personal.library = TRUE)
```

## Group Differences

The following plot shows how well the groups can 
be separated based on transcription in this tissue.

```{r cor_map, fig.align='center'}
include_graphics(file.path(data_dir, "Sample Similarity Analysis", "Correlation Network.pdf"))
```
